gw.plugin.validation

Interface ISearchCriteriaValidationPlugin

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin, java.rmi.Remote

    public interface ISearchCriteriaValidationPlugin
extends com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin
    This plugin validates what fields are required for search screens.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • validateCanSearch

        java.lang.String validateCanSearch(ActivitySearchCriteria searchCriteria)
        Validate the search criteria for Search/Activities, e.g. the user provided enough data to run the search.
        Parameters:
        searchCriteria - the search criteria to validate
        Returns:
        null if the criteria are valid, otherwise a user-displayable error message string

      • validateCanSearch

      • validateCanSearchSimple

        java.lang.String validateCanSearchSimple(ClaimInfoCriteria searchCriteria)
        Validate the search criteria for Search/Claims/Simple Search and Search/Claims/Advanced Search with source of "Archived", e.g. the user provided enough data to run the search.
        Parameters:
        searchCriteria - the search criteria to validate
        Returns:
        null if the criteria are valid, otherwise a user-displayable error message string
